text: Bradley Scott Jones (born 19 March 1982) is an Australian former professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He played in England for Middlesbrough, Stockport County, Rotherham United, Blackpool, and Sheffield Wednesday. ==Club career statistics== Club Season Division League National Cup League Cup
